name: @tpluscode/paper-autocomplete
description: Frankenstein autocomplete assembled from paper elements
author: paper-autocomplete

scripts.lint:prettier: prettier "**/*.js" --list-different || (echo '↑↑ these files are not prettier formatted ↑↑' && exit 1)
scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.format: npm run format:eslint && npm run format:prettier
